channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here's What Retirement Looks Like When Real Estate is Your 401(k)
item.description: Four retirees open up about their finances and how they spend their time.

item.title: ‘We live on a fixed income’: My husband and I are retired. We’re invited to our niece’s destination wedding. Are we obliged to buy a gift?
item.description: “We haven’t been to a wedding in decades.”

item.title: Heard on the Street's Stock-Picking Contest
item.description: Read about our columnists’ favorite and least-favorite stocks and see how they have performed.

item.title: ‘Her world is rocked’: A friend hit the jackpot, but her old friends are abandoning her one by one. Is there a cure for jealousy?
item.description: “Is this jealousy or a change in perceived status that has upended her friendships? Any ideas or cures?”

item.title: Nvidia Is No Cisco, but It Is Getting Expensive
item.description: The chip maker’s valuation is nowhere near those seen in dot-com boom, but recent gains have erased the stock’s discount relative to its projected ear...

item.title: ‘A few motherly words of wisdom can go a long way’: My two adult sons will each inherit $100,000. What should they do with it?
item.description: “We live in the greater Boston area, so housing costs are extremely high.”

item.title: These Hot New Funds Are 'Boomer Candy' for Retirees
item.description: Derivative strategies in ETFs allow investors to chase stock returns while also offering protection against a potential market downturn.

item.title: ‘It’s the saddest thing’: I’m happily retired and my friends in their 60s want to know how I did it. Should I tell them my secret?
item.description: “I’m in a comfortable position now where I can live off of my interest, dividends, Social Security, and retirement account.”

item.title: AI Is Helping Scammers Outsmart You---and Your Bank
item.description: Your “spidey sense” is no match for the new wave of scammers.

item.title: 5 ways a financial adviser can keep estate-planning fights from splitting your family
item.description: Experts who understand wills and trusts use these resources to guide you.
